name: mcp-llm-talk
description: Slides for MCP & LLM talk (June 2025 Edmonton Py/JS/Rb)

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler deploy --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: _SENTRY_RELEASE=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && sentry-cli releases new $_SENTRY_RELEASE --org=udia --project=mcp-llm-talk && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org=udia --project=mcp-llm-talk --release=$_SENTRY_RELEASE --strip-prefix 'dist/..' dist
